amendment.description: Amendment provides that no satellites of U.S. origin (including commercial satellites and satellite components) may be exported or reexported to the People's Republic of China; and provides that no information, equipment, or technology that could be used in the development or production of any satellite or launch vehicle may be exported or reexported to the People's Republic of China.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in part A of House Rept. 105-544 to prohibit the export or re-export of any U.S. satellites to the People's Republic of China.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 364 - 54 (Roll No. 170).
